headline: A Look At Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) is back in focus for investors as recent share moves contrast with its longer term track record and raise questions about how its life science REIT model is currently being valued. See our latest analysis for Alexandria Real Estate Equities. The recent 1-day share price return of 1.96% and 7-day share price return of 3.22% sit against a 30-day share price decline of 5.19%, while the year-to-date share price return of 12.56% contrasts with a 1-year total...
